attributes.action: Englands a last refuge for democracy
attributes.additional_details:
England is the ideal (and last) refuge because we do not agree to 'indoctrination, tyranny and intimidation' until The EU Lisbon Treaty made it impossible to discriminate between 'good' legislation and 'bad' legislation. If the (EU) ECHR makes all the ruling then what is the point of democracy, MP's, MEP's or even the House of Lords?  It's a fake democracy that is being offered to the English people.

The BBC should be relocated to Brussels.

So please can we leave the EU now.
